title: Starter
price: 1 Platform, 3 Posts/week, Caption Writing, Appropriate Hashtags, Scheduling, Monlthy Call
dec: Navigating the digital landscape can be challenging. Our tailored social media packages are designed to help businesses establish a strong online presence, connect with potential customers, and share valuable insights.

Each package comes with a 30-minute monthly consultation to ensure your content resonates with your audience. Benefit from strategic post frequencies, engaging captions, and effective hashtag strategies.
If our standard packages don't quite fit your needs, don't hesitate to reach out for a custom solution. Together, we can craft a social media strategy that truly reflects your unique approach.

dec: Managing the administrative aspects can often divert your focus from core tasks. Our specialised admin packages are meticulously crafted to support businesses by handling the intricate details of billing, scheduling, emails, and more.

Rest assured, all administrative tasks I handle for you are conducted with strict GDPR compliance, ensuring that data is managed with the utmost care and confidentiality. Each package includes a 30-minute monthly consultation to align our administrative support with your evolving needs.

Opt for our admin support and let us manage the finer details, allowing you to dedicate your time and energy to your business. If our standard offerings don't perfectly align with your requirements, we're more than happy to tailor a solution that seamlessly fits your operations.
